Job Description: Vacature van Sterrk, locatie Purmerend, , Our client was founded in 2009 by two brothers who have built their own trading platform for international currency markets The brothers have a background in stock trading at large enterprise organizations but did not like the company culture, thus they started their own company The open and informal company culture is immediately noticeable when you walk in the office Everyone greets each other and the communal lunch is a daily routine In the kitchen you will find an old StarTrek pinballmachine and the rooftop terrace is heavily used during summertime In total they employ 25 employees whom all share a passion for what they do Everyone wants to be their best and enjoy informing others about what they are doing, , The platform built by this company is a marketplace for foreign currencies Large banks, traders and investors use this platform to buy and sell their foreign currencies in nanoseconds On a daily basis, over one billion dollars transfers over this platform The servers are located in New York, Amsterdam and Tokyo for an optimal handling of transactions The platform is a oneofakind platform and is the biggest on the European mainland, The core of the platform is currently built in Java, but is being migrated to C to enhance performance The GUIs around the core are built in C using ASPNET MVC and ReactJS as frontend framework, , During 2018 the company has initiated a very big technical overhaul of the platform The migration to C has been started and the NET architecture has been changed to a an ASPNET Web application using ReactJS in the frontend The user will notice very little of this maintenance however, behind the screens a lot has changed, As a Senior NET Developer you will work closely together with a frontend developer to ensure a good implementation of the new technologies The main reason for looking for new colleagues is the growth of the company and they are unable to keep up with the amount of work in a positive sense You will work in a team currently consisting of 1 Backend NET Developer, 1 frontend developer and a designer However, you will also work closely together wit the 8 C and Java Developers, , , , , , 5cd8a0b9cc68f9ffa4c9253553278a55

Job Description: UPS delivers millions of packages around the world daily From our early roots as an American bikemessenger company to our present day multibilliondollar global corporation, UPS has held a singular focus  empowering commerce around the world We have become the worlds largest package delivery company and a leading global provider of specialized transportation and logistics services, , Every day, we choreograph the infinite movements of goods, funds, and information in more than 200 countries and territories around the world and with millions of packages send and delivered daily our IT systems play a critical role To stay in the leading position and remain the best in class we need talented, driven and bright developers that understand these challenges and are able to fulfill that role, , , , UPS has been around for over 110 years and part of the success is the belief that people make the difference Our success is stability, long term employment and providing opportunities to grow within As a growing, dynamic Fortune 50 organization we have the kind of opportunities that will help you go as far as your ambition will take you, , Working in our Europe development center in Eindhoven means working in an international team with onsite people as well as team members located in other parts of the world Youll be working on projects and implementations of brokerage systems for countries around the world and be part of a large community of agile teams within brokerage A lot of project communication is done through video so travel is limited and based on need, , , , For our Europe development center in Eindhoven were looking for an Application Tech Lead that is able to work on enterprise type applications deployed across the world, , As a tech lead at UPS you work on enabling the delivery of functionality for highly complex IT Systems You collaborate with internal customers as well as with people in multiple agile teams and drive emerging technologies and processes like CICD and DevOps to ensure effective and efficient achievement of objectives Your primary role is to maintain product quality and support teams in all system life cycle activities eg analysis, technical requirements, design, coding, testing and the implementation of software, , , , , , oReview designs and adjust where needed, , oImplement coding standards within the teams, , oMentoring developers in their development, , oInteract with corporate partners on system components and backend systems, , oEnsure consistency of the product and maintain overall quality, , oDevelop and implement plans to remediate technical debt, , oMaintain code repository and management of Pull Requests

Institute BSI at Radboud University Nijmegen, Netherlands, , BSI is part of the Faculty of Social Sciences at Radboud University It is a multidisciplinary behavioural research institute Our researchers collaborate across the boundaries of psychology, educational science and communication science BSI has seven research programmes covering three major research themes 1 development and learning, 2 psychopathology, health and wellbeing, and 3 social processes and communication BSI is globally recognised for its topquality research on human behaviour We conduct fundamental research as well as appliedtranslational research, , BSI has stateoftheart research facilities for observational studies, experiments, eyetracking studies, EEG and other physiological measures, and behavioural measurements in real and 3D virtual environments The neuroimaging facilities of the Donders Centre for Cognitive Neuroimaging fMRI, MEG and TMS are available for research on the neural bases of behaviour Moreover, BSI is known for its successful graduate school and strong commitment to Open Science For more information, see our website, , , We want to get the best out of science, others and Mendix is on a mission to enable anyone in any organization  from the marketing coordinator to the software developer to the CEO  to create things that are transformational for their company We are fundamentally reinventing the way applications are created and were reinventing the future of software development Sounds ambitious, right We agree, , Not to brag, but nearly 4,000 organizations worldwide, including KLM, Medtronic, Merck, and Philips, rely on Mendix to build web and mobile applications Thousands of our customers use our platform to delight their clients and empower their employees Its no surprise that were a recognized Leader by Gartner and Forrester in a redhot market expected to exceed 21 billion by 2022 Ok, maybe we did want to brag a little But were proud of what weve accomplishedandwere humble enough to admit that we need you to make us even more effective, , In the role of Typescript Software Engineer you will contribute to enabling the Studio and Studio Pro editors  such as page editor, Navigation Editor, Domain Model Editor  for the endusers of the Mendix platform, , You will use your excellent programming skills in Typescript to deliver new features and improve product quality, , , , , , , While we live on different continents, speak different languages, and work on different things, we are bound by our MendixBlue guiding principles Being MendixBlue means that you live the culture, and you consistently improve it as we grow Its kind of a big deal, ,  Without our customers, we have no business So, if you act in the best interest of our customers, alwaysyou belong here, ,  We work to have a meaningful, lasting impact on the world So, if you aim high and think long termyou belong here, ,  We want to be what happens next So, if you ask what if and work to find a way or make oneyou belong here, ,  We look, not just at the sum of what an individual has done, but at the potential of who they can be So, if youre up for learning from your failuresyou belong here, ,  Inflated egos dont last here, humility does So, if you share credit and ensure that the best ideas win  regardless of who they come fromyou belong here, ,  If something needs doing, we do it So, if you focus on the outcome, and take initiative to get it doneyou belong here, ,  We use laughter as a common language We can ask for help and were happy to give it So, if you find joy and purpose in what you doyou belong here, , , , There are precious few jobs that let you create the future But youll find one at Mendix We are at a pivotal time in our companys existence where rapid growth meets stable funding This is the time for industrious people to raise their hands to solve the next generation of problems Mendix is a place where ambitious people can thrive where you can identify an issue, propose a solution, and build the structure to make it happen, , Mendix is a Siemens business, which means were backed by the resources and stability of one of the worlds largest and most forwardlooking enterprises Think job security, , Since our company was founded in 2005, our aim has been to create a great work environment for people at all stages in their careers Thats why we are so pleased and honored that we were rated a top Cloud Computing Company to work for in 2019, based on feedback from our employees on Glassdoor With offices in the Netherlands, the UK, Germany, and the US, and more coming, we provide an international playground to truly impact the world through lowcode

Introduction, ASML is one of the worlds leading manufacturers of semiconductorchipmaking equipment A majority of the worlds microchips receive their critical lithographic patterning in machines made by ASML In addition ASML produces metrology tools and advanced applications to analyze and optimize the performance of the customer production process, , Participate in the development of our distributed data and compute platform infrastructure Be accurate, be precise and own the specification, design and implementation of new features Onboard and configure open source or commercial packages that support the development of semiconductor process tuning applications on the ASML platform Support installation of these platforms in Korea, Taiwan, Israel, China and the US etc, Be part of this compute platform that is one of the main pillars under the production of the next generation microchips of Apple, Samsung and many others, , , , You will be working as a lead engineer in the virtual compute platform VCP This platform is developed inside ASML to host compute and analytics applications that aim to improve the yield in the semiconductor factories of our customers, , These applications take data from ASML scanners and ASML yield star equipment They combine this data to real time production corrections and scanner process diagnostics The corrections are sent back to the ASML production equipment Failure of the platform would mean failure of the customers TSMC, Samsung, Intel etc production facility, , The platform is currently developed based on DCOS We develop the platform aspects in our team Scheduling of resources, containerization, failover and data collection from scanner and measurement devices inside the fab We have an uptime requirement of 4 nines As a true distributed computing expert you will have your own view on such a baseline requirement but that might be a nice topic to discuss during an interview, , Installation and upgrade runs through Ansible Other technologies used now or in the future are Spark for data processing, Kafka for notifications and high volume data ingestion, Hadoop and HBASE for data storage, , Responsibilities of the Infrastructure Developer, , , , , , , Experience with DCOS, , Experience with new technology introduction  zero downtime including data migration, , Fan of automatic testing and qualification, , Available to work remotely outside regular office hours when it proves that attempt to build a failsafe system was not yet successful We really want this to be an exception, not a rule, , , , , , , , , , , You will be working at Business Line Applications The BL Apps develops Analytics  Control solutions that improve the accuracy of performance metrics such as overlay, focus, critical dimension as measured on the end product of a fab process wafers with chip structures The foundation underneath these processing algorithms is a distributed computing platform assembled in house and as said, installed at ASML customers WW, There are 3  4infra teams, 2030 engineers, Product Owners and Scrum Masters working on the platform layers

thoroughly understood and reflected in future product releases Another responsibility associated with this position is helping to design the product to overcome and eliminate challenges facing Enterprise organizations and to provide our customers and Partners with deeper guidance on how best to leverage the Dynamics 365 platform in both Cloud and on premises environments, , , , As a , Registration link wwwmendixcommendixworldutmmediumsalesmxworldmxrecutmcampaignGLCE20200901MendixWorld, , Our Guiding Principles, , While we live on different continents, speak different languages, and work on different things, we are bound by our MendixBlue guiding principles Being MendixBlue means that you live the culture, and you consistently improve it as we grow Its kind of a big deal, , We put the customer first  Without our customers, we have no business So, if you act in the best interest of our customers, alwaysyou belong here, , We think big  We work to have a meaningful, lasting impact on the world So, if you aim high and think long termyou belong here, , We innovate  We want to be what happens next So, if you ask what if and work to find a way or make oneyou belong here, , better apps, but also how different departments within the company operate, or help out building complete solutions with Mendix You will also be instrumental in setting up new and testing existing guidelines and digital execution practices, , , , , , , While we live on different continents, speak different languages, and work on different things, we are bound by our MendixBlue guiding principles Being MendixBlue means that you live the culture, and you consistently improve it as we grow Its kind of a big deal, ,  Without our customers, we have no business So, if you act in the best interest of our customers, alwaysyou belong here, ,  We work to have a meaningful, lasting impact on the world So, if you aim high and think long termyou belong here, ,  We want to be what happens next So, if you ask what if and work to find a way or make oneyou belong here, ,  We look, not just at the sum of what an individual has done, but at the potential of who they can be So, if youre up for learning from your failuresyou belong here, ,  Inflated egos dont last here, humility does So, if you share credit and ensure that the best ideas win  regardless of who they come fromyou belong here, ,  If something needs doing, we do it So, if you focus on the outcome, and take initiative to get it doneyou belong here, ,  We use laughter as a common language We can ask for help and were happy to give it So, if you find joy and purpose in what you doyou belong here, , , , There are precious few jobs that let you create the future But youll find one at Mendix We are at a pivotal time in our companys existence where rapid growth meets stable funding This is the time for industrious people to raise their hands to solve the next generation of problems Mendix is a place where ambitious people can thrive where you can identify an issue, propose a solution, and build the structure to make it happen, , Mendix is a Siemens business, which means were backed by the resources and stability of one of the worlds largest and most forwardlooking enterprises Think job security, , Since our company was founded in 2005, our aim has been to create a great work environment for people at all stages in their careers Thats why we are so pleased and honored that we were rated a top Cloud Computing Company to work for in 2019, based on feedback from our employees on Glassdoor With offices in the Netherlands, the UK, Germany, and the US, and more coming, we provide an international playground to truly impact the world through lowcode

sub applications and the maintenance, improving and making more scalable of current applications There are several challenging projects on the priorities list We are constantly working on the improvement and expansion of functions This includes automating the administrative processing via iDeal, the application of multiple languages, improving the frontend, the coupling with new partners and the converting of current functions in a modular microservice environment The base is always having a good quality of code and an optimal working procedure The goal is to work as a team and to improve as a team You work in a scrum team with which you determine the priorities, together with the Product Owners In consultation with the Product Owner you will provide all the necessary documentation and knowledge that you need to carry out the case or the project If necessary, you consult the stakeholders to collect the correct information Also, together with the Product Owner and designers, you provide the correct mockups and visualisations When all the information is available, you start working with the team, make the right documentation and plan the cases for the upcoming sprint You work in threeweekly sprints and the goal is to, as a team, finalise the jointly planned cases at the end of each sprint For each sprint the planned cases are pokered highlow split and at the end of the sprint you evaluate together with the team how all has proceeded Wij vragen What do you have to offer We are looking for an experienced C NET developer who can bring in his her knowledge and experience for the improving and expanding of the current application We have a passion for developers with opinions and ideas We believe it is important that as a senior developer you can guide the quality of the code and the working processes, manage them and where necessary improve them Must haves An analytical outlook Sufficient experience to help solve complex software issues Experience with large systems with a lot of volume Experience with MVC CNET, Module Pattern Angular andor other patterns A good knowledge of SOAP, REST and JSON Have knowledge of other technologies such as web servers, internet protocols, file systems, commandline management and tools such as FTP A good command of the English language, both in writing and speech Nice to haves PHP, Perl, Python, Ruby or a similar development language MySQL, nodejs andor grunt Cloud computing technologies andor mobile apps Wij bieden What do we have to offer A versatile job with freedom, responsibility and career opportunities Because Voordeeluitjesnl does not stand still, but neither do you Good conditions a competitive salary, 24 days holiday and appropriate allowances We also make provision for ones old age you will partake in a group pension insurance plan A position within an enthusiastic, growing organisation whereat the ambience and team spirit are essential Where you are given the space to learn, including trial and error, everyone shares knowledge with each other and memorable company outings are the norm Everything you need to carry out your job properly, including a sitstanddesk, enough breaks and coffee A fully catered lunch, every workday

Introduction, ASML is a market leader in scanning lithography technology We provide chipmakers with hardware, software and services to mass produce patterns on silicon This role is positioned in the Customer Support Applications Engineering department which acts as the bridge between global customers and ASMLs engineering development Our mission is to ensure optimal use of ASML technology for customers production processes As a Senior Application Engineer you will be the driving force in enabling worldwide customers to meet their semiconductor process roadmap using ASML technology Are you the technical guru were looking for to make an impact on the semiconductor industry, , Your main mission is to closely engage with our customers to propose tailormade hightech solutions With your innovative mindset, you go above and beyond to help our partners reach their production goals, Secondly, you will shape our partners requirements and drive for solutions within engineering development You will ensure both structural issue resolution as well as identify potential revenue generation, Finally, you will train your colleagues on new means and methods that you have developed with a team Besides the technical focus, you will also have the opportunity to guide junior engineers in their soft skills development, , , , As a key expert in the applications team, you establish new ways of working to create tomorrows value through new ASML products and services By leading performance improvement projects in a complex environment, your work will have a significant business impact Your technical knowledge about photolithography applications allows you to fulfill a consultancy role within ASML, , In addition, you excel in data processing eg MATLAB Python R and statistical analysis in order to interpret customer data from various use cases and machines Combined with your decisionmaking and communication skills, you propose timely and highquality solutions which make optimal use of existing methods, , Your main interfaces are ASMLs global customers and ASML colleagues from various disciplines including business and operations experts In addition, you create new channels of communication by recognizing where collaboration can be strengthened in order to achieve business growth, , This job requires up to 20 of international travel to provide tailormade support to our customers, , BSc, MSc or PhD in Mechanics, Physics, Mathematics, Electrical Engineering, Chemistry or a similar engineering degree, , , , , , , , , , , Based at ASML global headquarters in the Netherlands, you will have the unique opportunity to benefit from a high quality of living, excellent worklife balance and being surrounded by a large expat community We welcome international candidates to join our diverse and inclusive team and offer a relocation package if hired from abroad, , This job is challenging and fastpaced while also being highly rewarding It will involve continuous professional and personal development If you meet the above requirements and consider yourself to have the right combination of technical, analytical and personal skills, apply now, , , , Please include your resume and a cover letter when applying for this role where you explain your motivation to join our team

Wat doe je als Electricity Market Developer bij TenneT, , What do you do as an Electricity Market Developer at TenneT, , , Wat verwachten we van jou, , What do we expect from you, , , Wat kun je verwachten, , TenneT offers a challenging and responsible function within an innovative and dynamic international working environment We offer a competitive salary package job level 8 Cao TSO with excellent secondary benefits ie 6 end of year bonus, EUR 60, gross, health insurance allowance, good pension scheme as well as good training and development possibilities, , Duty location for this position is Arnhem, The Netherlands with regular travel across Europe, , An assessment can be part of the application procedure, , At entry, TenneT performs a PreEmployment Screening, , Waar kom je te werken, , TenneT is Europes first crossborder grid operator for electricity With approximately 24,000 kilometers of extra highvoltage lines and 42 million endusers in the Netherlands and Germany, we rank among the top five grid operators in Europe Our focus is to develop a NorthWest European energy market, to integrate renewable energy, and to optimize our safety performance Safety is a core value of TenneT We set high standards, for our employees as well as our contractors Taking power further, , The Customers  Markets CM department ensures and guarantees a high level of customer satisfaction and works to continuously improve the operation of the Dutch, German and European electricity market Technological development, the desire to develop a single integrated European electricity market and the transition to a sustainable electricity supply continually lead to the need to adjust roles and responsibilities and market arrangements, , The European Market Integration department is responsible for identifying and initiating developments in this area and for elaborating and guiding concrete improvements in the electricity market in close consultation with internal and external stakeholders, , We are searching for an Electricity Developer 1fte  Arnhem to strengthen our Customs  Markets department

Make a difference by designing smart logistic solutions for us You need excellent stakeholder management and analytical skills with a good helicopter view, , Wat ga je doen, , , As Supply Chain Developer and Designer SCDD you are part of a driven team Every SCDD is assigned to a multidisciplinary team in a specific supply chain Each supply chain is different, because it has its own stakeholders, applications and processes However there is a need in the team to be able to interchange SCDDs as needed To safeguard knowledge, you will be primary focused on your own supply chain A change of supply chain is not taken lightly, however if needed, we expect you to be able to do it, , Your main responsibility in this role is to maintain and improve the quality of your supply chain You make process designs and implement new products and solutions for Cross Border Solutions CBS, the business unit that provides tailormade delivery solutions to businesses worldwide Our clients are companies looking to exportimport their products At the moment the majority of our clients are in The Netherlands, Europe and Asia CBS makes use of the PostNL logistic infrastructure, therefore your biggest challenge is to create a process design that connects the logistic operation in the Netherlands with the logistic operation abroad Taking into account the processes, the clients needs and the commercial network salesmarketing This means that you will need to become an specialist by talking to a lot of people within the organisation to get the information that you need for your designs, as well as to implement new solutions Related to this last, you are responsible for providing working solutions for our customers Therefore you will be in charge of the project coordination with regards to the implementation of new products and modifications of existing products in your supply chain You are part of a multidisciplinary team, consequently reporting to the product owner, however you manage your own responsibilities, ncluding testing and making sure that the implementation of new products is done properly Thereafter someone else will take ownership, , , , , , We want to be the preferred service provider by supporting the crossborder ecommerce market with creative and innovative solutions We want to keep it simple, smart and we want to do it together Our employees and customers are key We are always looking for ways to be better As a result, we need you to develop our supply chain To this end, you need to translate our businesss needs and models into highquality reliable solutions We are facing very interesting changes and challenges As an example our Brexit project, that requires for us to make various modifications to our existing solutions Other examples are the needed and continuous automatization of our processes for Packets, the modernization and efficiency upgrade of our network, datadriven working standardization, the improvement of the supply chain visibility, the expansion of our business in Asia and the growth of our Returns solutions In this role you get the chance of helping with these challenges and seeing how our innovations work, , , , , , You are an analytical, handson problem solver with an eye for detail We are looking for a professional with the ability to see the bigger picture and at the same time being able to include the details Someone who likes to know how things work and wants to achieve goals as a team Please note that to qualify you need to have all relevant and valid working entitlements visawork permit and must currently reside in The Netherlands, , , , , , We offer you a farreaching and meaningful job Your solutions, ideas and smart plans have a direct impact on millions of customers around the world Including you We provide a motivating work environment that allows you to develop professionally Together we are shaping the future of ecommerce, , , PostNL wants to be everyones favourite logistics company Therefore everyone is welcome to join us Where you were born, what you believe in and who you love is irrelevant to us We care only about your unique talent  Thereafter we will advise you on the status of your application A Certificate of ConductVOG and preemployment screening are part of the selection process, , The video job interviews are planned for December 8, 2020 If you are not available on this date, please let us know in advance

Job Description: Auth0 is a unicorn that just closed a 120M Series F round of funding, with total capital raised to date of 330M and valuation of nearly 2B We are growing rapidly and looking for exceptional new team members to add to our exceptional talent pool  and who will help take us to the next level of success One team, one score, , Our vision is to provide people with secure access to any application in one click or less And our promise is to make identity work for everyonewhether youre a developer looking to innovate, or a security professional looking to mitigate We are looking for curious, excited, boundarypushing team members So, if youre a big thinker who is nimble and adaptable, Auth0 may be an ideal place for you to shine, , We are growing the Auth0 Administration Experience Engineering team and are looking for a Full Stack Engineer to help us design and build an amazing product You would be a great fit for the team if you enjoy working on challenging problems and care deeply about the products enduser experience Not only are we looking for a talented engineer, but we are also looking for someone who will contribute to our culture , , Many of our customers are larger enterprise organizations The administrators in these companies care about security and want to make sure their employees access vendors platforms with the minimum privileges required, using their enterprise credentials and complying with their security policies At the same time, they need to manage their relationship with Auth0 in a centralized way The Administration Experience Engineering team is committed to providing administrators in large organizations the seamless, transparent, and secure experience they expect from an enterpriseready SaaS product, , , , , During the last year, we have built a completely new Dashboard for Administrators to manage their tenants and team members from the centralized place This solution consists of a web application created with TypeScript and React web framework and a Nodejs application for serving the backend REST API Its currently in early access with plans for going GA in 2021 In addition, we are currently working on introducing a set of new roles into Auth0 Manage Dashboard to support Role Base Access Control RBAC in this application, , Due to the success and growth of Auth0 we are looking for an engineer to help us build an amazing product and experience We are aiming to increase our team in order to take some new big projects to help grow our product Some of the projects in our roadmap include tenant and team management public APIs, extended RBAC on both account and tenantlevel finegrain authorization, , , , , , , , , , , , , , Auth0 safeguards more than 45 billion login transactions each month and its top priorities are availability and security, , We like to think that we are helping make the internet safer Our team is spread across more than 35 countries and we are proud to continually be recognized as a great place to work Culture is critical to us, and we are transparent about our vision and principles , , Auth0 is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer Auth0 conducts all employmentrelated activities without regard to race, religion, color, national origin, age, sex, marital status, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, genetics, or status as a Vietnamera special disabled and other covered veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law Auth0 participates in EVerify and will confirm work authorization for candidates residing in the United States

Mendix is on a mission to enable anyone in any organization  from the marketing coordinator to the software developer to the CEO  to create things that are transformational for their company We are fundamentally reinventing the way applications are created and were reinventing the future of software development Sounds ambitious, right We agree, , Not to brag, but nearly 4,000 organizations worldwide, including KLM, Medtronic, Merck, and Philips, rely on Mendix to build web and mobile applications Thousands of our customers use our platform to delight their clients and empower their employees Its no surprise that were a recognized Leader by Gartner and Forrester in a redhot market expected to exceed 21 billion by 2022 Ok, maybe we did want to brag a little But were proud of what weve accomplishedandwere humble enough to admit that we need you to make us even more effective, , Mendix is a visual, modelbased IDE to create mobile  web apps On top of this, our platform supports cloud deployment, feedback  collaboration and reusable components via our app store As a result, Mendix is the fastest and easiest way to create and continuously improve mobile and web apps at scale, , The Identity Services team strives to offer a strong foundation so that developers and endusers can enjoy frictionless authentication and authorization across the whole Mendix platform, , Digital identity is the corner stone for all new offerings in the digital world Giants as Facebook  Google are trying to dominate this space by expanding aggressively, who havent signed into an app using their identity provider At Mendix we understand the value of digital identity and have a team fully focused on having a best in breed solution Our solution will be fundamental for the experience of millions of Mendix application users Not only for how they access applications, but how they can interact and get value out of complete app landscapes Be part of this exciting selfsteering team and shape how any user can be wowed in an app landscape, , , , , , , While we live on different continents, speak different languages, and work on different things, we are bound by our MendixBlue guiding principles Being MendixBlue means that you live the culture, and you consistently improve it as we grow Its kind of a big deal, ,  Without our customers, we have no business So, if you act in the best interest of our customers, alwaysyou belong here, ,  We work to have a meaningful, lasting impact on the world So, if you aim high and think long termyou belong here, ,  We want to be what happens next So, if you ask what if and work to find a way or make oneyou belong here, ,  We look, not just at the sum of what an individual has done, but at the potential of who they can be So, if youre up for learning from your failuresyou belong here, ,  Inflated egos dont last here, humility does So, if you share credit and ensure that the best ideas win  regardless of who they come fromyou belong here, ,  If something needs doing, we do it So, if you focus on the outcome, and take initiative to get it doneyou belong here, ,  We use laughter as a common language We can ask for help and were happy to give it So, if you find joy and purpose in what you doyou belong here, , , , There are precious few jobs that let you create the future But youll find one at Mendix We are at a pivotal time in our companys existence where rapid growth meets stable funding This is the time for industrious people to raise their hands to solve the next generation of problems Mendix is a place where ambitious people can thrive where you can identify an issue, propose a solution, and build the structure to make it happen, , Mendix is a Siemens business, which means were backed by the resources and stability of one of the worlds largest and most forwardlooking enterprises Think job security, , Since our company was founded in 2005, our aim has been to create a great work environment for people at all stages in their careers Thats why we are so pleased and honored that we were rated a top Cloud Computing Company to work for in 2019, based on feedback from our employees on Glassdoor With offices in the Netherlands, the UK, Germany, and the US, and more coming, we provide an international playground to truly impact the world through lowcode

Zo maak je samen met ons het reizen met de trein nog beter en leuker voor onze reizigers Elke dag weer De reis van morgen begint bij jou, , , Het Competence Center Mobiel CCM vormt samen met het Competence Center Integratie CCI een afdeling die op een wendbare manier informatie uit NSsystemen kan ontsluiten en deze op een gebruikersvriendelijke manier kan presenteren  op welk apparaat dan ook Daardoor kunnen onze collegas steeds makkelijker plaats en tijdonafhankelijk bij de informatie die hen helpt om de reiziger op 1, 2 en 3 te zetten We ontwikkelen in korte iteraties, zodat we snel bij de gebruikers van onze software kunnen toetsen of onze oplossingen waarde toevoegen, , De afdeling deelt opgedane kennis en ervaring met andere afdelingen Daardoor ontstaat er een olievlekwerking iedereen die dat wil, wordt geholpen en kan zelf helpen om informatie toegankelijk voor iedereen te maken Door deze activiteiten is ook een onboarding routine ontstaan om snel nieuwe technologien bijvoorbeeld RPA, Processmining, Kafka te adopteren en samen met onze technische domeinarchitecten en onze infrastructuurspecialisten deze technologien tot een bruikbaar platform te transformeren Daardoor krijgt onze ITorganisatie sneller toegang tot deze technologien, , CCM en CCI zijn nu nog in Amersfoort gehuisvest Het is de bedoeling dat deze afdelingen begin 2020 een plek in het hoofdkantoor in Utrecht krijgen, CCM en CCI realiseren ook toepassingen voor bedrijfskritische functies Dat betekent dat je in voorkomende gevallen meeloopt in wachtdiensten

gedreven Kun jij jezelf positioneren binnen het ontwikkeltraject en de klant helpen hun processen te optimaliseren op basis van de laatste technieken Dan ben jij misschien de persoon die wij zoeken Waar SAP voorheen met eigen technieken en oplossingen kwam, bouwt SAP steeds meer Intelligent Enterprise Applications op open source software en technieken Met de komst van Cloud Foundry binnen het ondersteunen Vanaf een traditionele werkplek met een laptop, tot op elke moment en plaats vanaf een mobiel device Bij Creetion zijn we op zoek naar de persoon die zich kan onderscheiden van de rest Die flexibel en gedreven is om meerdere technieken en tools eigen te maken, zowel SAP als open source Een persoon met het analytisch vermogen om procesproblemen in kaart te brengen en die creatief is Job Description: Vacature van Jelling IT Professionals BV, locatie Zoetermeer, , Developer starter  Het bedrijf, , De organisatie telt 20  25 medewerkers en richt zich op alle network  security gebied van informatieveiligheid, , De bedrijfscultuur is open en laagdrempelig korte lijnen, eerlijke en directe communicatie Kritiek en complimenten gaan hand in hand en er is begrip voor ieders situatie Zo wordt er rekening gehouden met degenen die een gezin hebben, studeren of parttime willen werken Als inzet toont en progressie boekt, is er een hoop bespreekbaar Het is een erg coulante en en beveiligingssoftware Daarnaast help je ook mee met coderen van communicatienetwerken met de hoogste beveiligingsgraad, , Binnen een Linux omgeving wordt de basis voor de code geschreven in PHP en meer informatie op of mail  bel rechtstreeks naar via de button Solliciteer nu op deze pagina  06  43 97 13 86, , Jelling IT Professionals streeft naar gelijke kansen op de arbeidsmarkt voor iedereen Wij selecteren niet op geslacht, leeftijd, afkomst, etc en nodigen daarom iedereen die zich herkent in bovenstaand profiel van harte uit om te solliciteren, , 5cd8a0b9cc68f9ffa4c9253553278a55

Job Title: Fullstack ontwikkelaar | ASP.NET | Azure | persoonlijke ontwikkeling | Vught | Star Apple
Industry: ['Information Technology and Services', 'Computer Software', 'Computer & Network Security']
Job Description: Vacature van Star Apple, locatie Vught, , Op zoek naar een 1e of 2e stap in jou carrire Op zoek naar een innovatief bedrijf, nabij Vught, waar jij komt te werken als fullstack developer waar jij ervaring en kennis gaat opdoen van cloudbased programmeren met oa Azure, ASPNET en webservices Lees dan snel onderstaande tekst, , , , In deze functie ontwikkel jij nieuwe functionaliteiten in de gebruikersomgeving en de ontwikkelomgeving Jij denkt mee en bent betrokken bij het gehele proces van A tm Z, van ontwerpfase tot de ontwikkeling en het testen van de software Dit zorgt voor een zeer varirende functie waar je jouw kennis en ervaring verbreed op meerdere vlakken Dit zorgt voor een grote bijdrage aan het eindproduct en zie je directe resultaten terug in de software voor de klanten In samenwerking met de consultant bouw je aan een windows applicatie platform Dit platform bestaat uit verschillende onderdelen en technologien De applicatie waaruit de klanten werken is volledig cloudbased Naast het continue ontwikkelen aan dit platform werk je voornamelijk aan het opzetten en verbeteren van bestaande en nieuwe cloudbased applicaties Dit doe je middels een eigen Scrum methode en sprints van 2 weken Elke ochtend is er een standup om de vorige dag en de aankomende dagen te bespreken De technieken en toolings die worden gebruikt zijn oa ASPNET, Azure, UI, Automated Testing, Databases, React en nodejs, , , , Dit bedrijf levert een innovatief platform voor planningsystemen die cloudbased zijn Ze werken voor Amerken die actief zijn in verschillend branches als luchtvaart, consumptie en olie De ontwikkelaars bouwen het platform en de consultants gebruiken het platform om bij de klanten maatwerk te verrichten op basis van wensen en behoeftes Het platform is een complexe omgeving wat ervoor zorgt dat ze met 30 slimme koppen telkens op zoek moeten zijn naar gaten in de markt Ze zijn op zoek naar niches in de markt waar ze nieuwe producten voor kunnen programmeren Mbt hun software maken ze bijvoorbeeld gebruik van Azure, Automated testing, UI, modelleer componenten en REST interfaces, , Het is een jong en open bedrijf Ze hebben een IT team 3 vaste developers en 2 stagiaires Er heerst een familiegevoel, zitten in een nieuwe ruimte, ze doen veel aan ontspanning en kennissessies, stimuleren persoonlijke groei en hebben elke woensdagmiddag een lunchspecial, , , , , , , , Spreekt dit jou allemaal aan Neem dan contact met mij op middels onderstaande gegevens, , Telefoonnummer 088321 8 123 Emailadres, , Trefwoorden Software ontwikkelaar, Fullstack ontwikkelaar, Software developer, Software engineer, ASPNET, C, NET, Azure, Javascript, nodejs, WCF, React, Webservices, UI, databases, Kaatsheuvel, Tilburg, Oss, Den Job Description, , At Danfoss we are looking for our new Application Engineer Heating Solutions, , Do you have a technical background, like to work and share your knowledge with your team, be involved with projects and clients Look no further and see what we have on offer for you, , , , The Heating department in the Netherlands has 15 colleagues divided over sales and technical sales support We are looking for a new colleague, preferably based at our sales office in Rotterdam In addition to the exciting role with plenty of opportunities to develop and grow, the package also includes a company car, , The emphasis for this role is on commissioning, engineering and quotations of control technology and building management installations for both utility and residential housing, , After a thorough period of onboarding Coronaproof, you can expect the following activities working on challenging technical proposals and quotations Support the team sales and sales support with your expertise Besides office work you are also involved with the commissioning of technical installations Systems sometimes have malfunctions The team and our clients depend on you to find and solve these malfunctions Monitor the quality of the products claim handling and process the administration in our complaint handing system and Salesforce Another important task is providing translations of technical documentation and in due time provide product and application training, , This role offers a diverse and challenging operating environment where quotations, administration, products, applications and clients meet A unique combination of practical and theoretical cases combined in 1 position, , , , To be successful, we expect you to have a degree in Mechanical and or Electrical Engineering combined with several years of relevant working experience in a technical environment In addition, we also expect the following, , , For further details, please contact Tom Robert Schouten, Talent Acquisition Specialist at 31 10 24 92 127, , , , At Danfoss, we are engineering solutions that allow the world to use resources in smarter ways  driving the sustainable transformation of tomorrow No transformation has ever been started without a group of passionate, dedicated and empowered people We believe that innovation and great results are driven by the right mix of people with diverse backgrounds, personalities, skills, and perspectives, reflecting the world in which we do business To make sure the mix of people works, we strive to create an inclusive work environment where people of all backgrounds are treated equally, respected, and valued for who they are It is a strong priority within Danfoss to improve the health, working environment and safety of our employees, , Following our founders mindset action speaks louder than words, we set ourselves ambitious targets to protect the environment by embarking on a plan to become CO2 neutral latest by 2030

Job Description: Were glad you want to help us make a difference, We create better everyday conditions for people We do this by contributing to a more sustainable future through engineering innovation We love what we do and were good at it Were now looking for passionate people to become even better, , , , , , Alfa Laval Benelux is a successful Sales Company that operates in Alfa Lavals 3 main market areas Energy, Food  Water and Marine, covering the Belgium and Dutch market We are 120 employees working in 4 divisions plus a Shared Services, Communications, Quality and HR department, , Are you a team player with a passion for heat transfer technology, , Are you full of energy and result oriented, , Then you could be our new colleague, , , , You are a technical product specialist with commercial drive and are passionate about providing customers with the optimum solution to their needs You are proactive, selfdriven and structured, analytical and eager to learn new things and to understand each aspect of the products you are accountable for You have a positive attitude with a service mindset and always aim for high quality, , , , You are an active team player in the Food  Water Channel Sales team that is providing sales support to endusers and Alfa Laval channel partners in the field of fluid handling In close collaboration with your colleagues you provide technical advice to our customers and help them make the best selections from Alfa Lavals portfolio, which includes among others valves, pumps and tank cleaning equipment You determine the right technical specifications and translate this into a commercial offer In addition, you support our channel partners by training and guiding them to represent Alfa Lavals brand and products In your role you have frequent contact with our channel partners and endusers and together with your colleagues you ensure that the team is successful in delivering a great customer experience, , , , You have a technical education at BSc level and some experience within a similar position or in technical sales Knowledge of fluid handling equipment such as pumps and valves is an asset, as is experience in a technical or technicalcommercial environment Affinity with IT systems is preferable Solid language skills in both Dutch and English are a must, French is an advantage, , It is a plus to be familiar with the Food  Water industry, ideally in sanitary fluid handling applications, , , , You will be working in an international B2B environment and we offer a challenging position in an open and friendly atmosphere where we help each other to develop and create value Your work will have a true impact on Alfa Lavals future success, , , , Sales Manager Hans Dekker, mobile phone  31 6 82401698 and send your application via following link no later than 30Nov2020

customer trends, collecting feedback for Eatons engineering teams and training the ETiB Account Managers on the technical specifications of applications The successful candidate demonstrates extensive experience in software and electrical application design, as well as knowledge of a sales environment, , , , In order to provide application support that satisfies customers, the Application Engineer application designs that respond to customer needs and provide innovative solutions to common problems, writing and executing integrated testing scenarios in cooperation with the service team, working with the customer to optimize their solution proposal and ensuring it stays uptodate, continuing to meet customers requirements, , In order to design and redesign effective total solution concepts, successful candidate acquires and analyses customer needs and problems, making recommendations to the engineering team and develops tailored solutions The Application Engineer also generates ideas to engineering for new offerings that innovate and fills gaps in the current market and Eatons portfolio, , This position is supporting daily technical enquiries and work collaboratively with international ETiB engineering teams to deliver technical solutions, supervises procurement processes and coordinate project logistics with the central team for the supply and delivery of materials and components needed to install the solution, , The Application Engineer maintains a close relation with the sales team to ensure a good understanding of the client needs in a timely manner and support from a technical point of view various initiatives developed within the team as per Eatons strategy, , , , , , , , , , You can reach out for more information at this email address ThijsEngelbertinkeatoncom, , Candidate applying to the vacancy may be subject of the background screening, , We make what matters work Everywhere you lookfrom the technology and machinery that surrounds us, to the critical services and infrastructure that we depend on every dayyoull find one thing in common It all relies on power Thats why Eaton is dedicated to improving peoples lives and the environment with power management technologies that are more reliable, efficient, safe and sustainable Because this is what matters We are confident we can deliver on this promise because of the Job Title: Docent en ontwikkelaar Associate degree Sociaal Financiële Dienstverlening
Company Name: HU University of Applied Sciences Utrecht Hogeschool Utrecht
Job Description: Als docent en ontwikkelaar aan de wieg staan van een compleet nieuwe opleiding Op onze Amersfoortse vestiging zijn wij druk aan het bouwen aan nieuwe Associate degrees 2jarige hboopleidingen op NLQFniveau 5 een niveau tussen de Bachelor en niveau4 Inmiddels zijn wij succesvol gestart met een achttal Ad opleidingen en hebben we de ambitie om dit verder uit te breiden Wij hopen hier in 2022 de Ad Sociaal Financile Dienstverlening aan toe te voegen Wij zijn dan ook op zoek naar nieuwe collegas met een drive, passie en kennis die samen met ons de uitdaging aangaan om in een kort tijdsbestek een topopleiding neer te zetten, , , , Als docent en ontwikkelaar van Ad Sociaal Financile Dienstverlening ontwikkel je in de eerste periode in een klein team het curriculum en alle aanverwante zaken Je hebt flinke invloed op de inhoud en weet met jouw kennis en eigen netwerk hier een goede bijdrage aan te geven Bij de start van de opleiding ben je actief als docent waarbij je inhoudelijke lessen en begeleiding verzorgt Uiteraard sta je in nauw contact met je studenten en geeft hen feedback op door hun ontwikkelde beroepsproducten en op hun aandeel in het proces Je vervult hierin een voorbeeldrol voor de studenten en bent onderdeel van een integraal leerteam Een nauwe aansluiting met de beroepspraktijk is onmisbaar Daarom zoek je altijd de samenwerking en cocreatie met jouw netwerk in het bedrijfsleven, de HU, MBO collegaopleidingen en externe deskundigen, , , , , , , , , , Je krijgt een arbeidsovereenkomst tot eind augustus 2021 D4 met een omvang van 0,4 0,6 fte Verlenging behoort in beginsel tot de mogelijkheden, na goedkeuring van de opleiding door de NVAO Bij benoeming van een interne kandidaat behoudt deze zijn huidige rechtspositie Afhankelijk van jouw kennis en ervaring is het bruto maandsalaris bij een volledig dienstverband minimaal  2769,32 en maximaal  4892,31 schaal 10 of 11 Daarboven ontvang je volgens de caohbo een vakantietoeslag van 8 en gegarandeerde eindejaarsuitkering van 8,3 Wij hebben daarnaast uitstekende studie en ontwikkelingsmogelijkheden Verder is er keuze tussen een kortere werkweek of meer verlof bij een langere werkweek en is er flexibiliteit in werktijden Wij hebben tenslotte een vrijwillige collectieve ziektekostenverzekering en leukeu202fextrasu202fzoals fietsplan en kortingen bij andere verzekeringen, software en fitness, , , , Het Instituut Associate degrees IAd van Hogeschool Utrecht is per 1 september 2018 gestart met het aanbieden van tweejarige hboopleidingen op locatie Amersfoort Onze Adopleidingen zijn praktijkgerichte hboopleidingen van 120 studiepunten EC De opleidingen hebben een eigen positie en zijn relevant voor de arbeidsmarkt Doelstelling is om op korte termijn structureel door te groeien naar 1500 Associatie degreestudenten Bij de ontwikkeling van de Ads werken we nauw samen met het regionale mbo, bedrijven en instellingen Bij het leren staat de student centraal en wordt altijd gewerkt vanuit de werkelijke beroepssituatie Een Ad is daarmee een uitstekende vervolgopleiding voor mboers, maar is ook uitermate geschikt voor praktisch ingestelde havisten, , , , Het IAD heeft een eigen onderwijsvisie met 10 leidende principes Het onderwijs wordt ontwikkeld vanuit het whole tasks gedachtegoed waarbij de individuele competentieontwikkeling ten behoeve van het aanleren van complexe vaardigheden uit de beroepspraktijk centraal staat Begeleiding van de student tijdens zijnhaar ontwikkeling is essentieel en het onderwijs is daarop ingericht door assessment for learningvormen Er is veel ruimte in reallife praktijksituaties, bij voorkeur wordt het praktijkdeel ontwikkeld in cocreatie met het werkveld De ontwikkeling van de student wordt ondersteund door leerteamleren, , , , En, hebben we je enthousiasme gewekt Of juist nog meer vragen opgeroepen Dat laatste is niet erg, want dan hebben we iets om te bespreken tijdens het sollicitatiegesprek Heb je om die stap te kunnen nemen nog prangende vragen, neem dan contact op met Eva van Haaren Corporate Recruiter via 06 39113938 Meer informatie over werken bij Hogeschool Utrecht is verder te vinden opu202fwwwwerkenbijhunl, , Solliciteren is uitsluitend digitaal mogelijk tot en met 29 november Sollicitatiegesprekken vinden op dit moment digitaal plaats Een referentiecheck en een digitale screening op diploma en ID vindt aan het einde van de procedure plaats, , Solliciteren Afdrukken

Job Title: FAST Rotation Program-Field Application Engineer Track - NETHERLANDS
Job Description: As a global semiconductor company operating in 35 countries, Texas Instruments TI is first and foremost a reflection of its people From the TIer who unveiled the first working integrated circuit in 1958 to the more than 30,000 TIers around the world today who design, manufacture and sell analog and embedded processing chips, we are problemsolvers collaborating to change the world through technology Put your talent to work with us  change the world, love your job, , TIs FAST Field Applications  Sales Training Rotation Program is designed to prepare Sales  Applications team members for customeroriented careers that pair technical skills with business perspectives The program provides experiences that help rising TIers understand how to successfully grow TIs business and to thrive throughout their entire TI career There are two available FAST program tracks 1 Field Applications and 2 Technical Sales, Field Applications Engineer track, , , , This 12month experience aims to establish rising Field Applications Engineers FAEs as technical TI experts with customer engineers and internal teams, , Rotation 1, Field Sales Office FSO The FSO rotation is centered on learning how to work directly with customers to solve technical challenges, and to ultimately maximize TIs revenue by providing customers with the systemslevel solutions that best address their design needs Among other aspects, the FSO rotation focuses on analyzing technical tradeoffs, understanding component selection, and solving design and cost challenges, , Rotation 2, Systems Engineering  Marketing SEM The SEM rotation provides handson experiences that help future FAEs understand how various TI components fit together to provide systemslevel solutions for customer designs This rotation focuses on technical product selection, schematiclayout capture, PCB layouts, fabrication processes, board bring up and validation, , , , Upon successful completion of the Field Applications Engineer track, rotators are welcomed as FAEs on TIs Worldwide Sales  Applications team, , , , , , , , Texas Instruments will not sponsor job applicants for visas or work authorization for this position, , Sales

Het Nederlandse spoorwegnet is het drukste spoorwegnet in Europa De spoorwegbeveiligingsxadsystemen zorgen ervoor dat botsingen tussen treinen, ontsporingen, of aanrijdingen met wegverkeer of personeel worden voorkomen Movares is specialist op dit vakgebied en levert maatwerkoplossingen op het gebied van spoorwegbeveiliging, , Op dit moment vindt er in de wereld van de spoorwegbeveiligingssystemen een verschuiving plaats van seinen naar ERTMS, van relaistechniek naar digitale technieken zoals PLCs en van conventioneel ontwerpen naar geautomatiseerd ontwerpen op basis van geodata  Movares is daarom op zoek naar een enthousiaste elektrotechnisch ingenieur die affiniteit heeft met digitale technieken en er plezier in heeft om processen te automatiseren, , De functie is erg afwisselend en kent vele uitdagingen Je gaat werken aan verschillende opdrachten waarbij je in een team een bijdrage levert in diverse fasen van een project van het functioneel ontwerpen van het spoorwegbeveiligingssysteem, het uitvoeren van de verificatie en validatieactiviteiten, het opstellen van testspecificaties, het uitvoeren van testen tot het in bedrijf stellen van de door jou en jouw team ontworpen beveiligingsinstallatie, , De werkzaamheden die je voor Movares uitvoert hebben voornamelijk plaatsvinden op het kantoor van Movares in Utrecht Je werkt aan opdrachten door heel Nederland Incidenteel zul je buiten kantooruren op de projectlocatie aanwezig zijn, zoals bijvoorbeeld tijdens het testen en in bedrijf stellen Kijk voor voorbeelden van projecten ook eens op Spoorbeveiliging Spoorwegbeveiligingtreinbeveiliging, , Tot jouw werkzaamheden behoren onder meer, , , , , , , , , , Movares heeft al jarenlange ervaring op het gebied van spoorwegveiligheid en levert maatwerkoplossingen voor diverse, veelal complexe vraagstukken Het Nederlandse spoorwegnet is immers het drukste spoorwegnet in Europa Iedereen wil zich niet alleen snel kunnen verplaatsen per trein, tram en metro, maar vooral ook veilig De spoorwegbeveiligingssystemen moeten daarvoor zorgen De groep Spoorbeveiliging, onderdeel van de afdeling Beveiligingstechniek binnen Movares begeleidt opdrachtgevers in de gehele levenscyclus van spoorbeveiligingssystemen van verkennende studies tot het ontwerp, realisatie en onderhoud voor de beveiliging van trein, tram en metroverkeer Samen met onze opdrachtgevers ontwikkelen we optimale oplossingen, zodat de reizigers zich veilig kunnen blijven verplaatsen Nu, en in de verre toekomst

Creating impact on the booming Ecommerce market through our logistics software As Senior Nodejs Developer, you make this happen by translating the critical logistics business processes to the development and expansion of our Cloud IT platforms and software solutions in JavaScript and AWS, , , ,  As Senior Nodejs Developer you are part of a multidisciplinary BusinessITteam comprising among others, a Lead Engineer, Developers and Solution Consultants Together you form an actively collaborative team responsible for developing the Event Management Platform EMP This platform encompasses all PostNLs logistic events, IoT Internet of Things observations and trends resulting from the logistic process This vital data is used, for example, to make decisions as to whether a recipient can still change their delivery slot and or exceptions occur in the logistic execution process The Event Management Platform is at the core of PostNLs new management platform through which we are able to significantly improve the operational chain and create new revenue models and services for our customers, , Within this team, new software applications are mainly developed in JavaScript using various AWS functionality for optimal scalability In addition we use Github, JSON, Kafka and NodeRed, , , , , , , , We want to be the favorite logistics company by delivering special moments every day Our Mendix is on a mission to enable anyone in any organization  from the marketing coordinator to the software developer to the CEO  to create things that are transformational for their company We are fundamentally reinventing the way applications are created and were reinventing the future of software development Sounds ambitious, right We agree, , Not to brag, but nearly 4,000 organizations worldwide, including KLM, Medtronic, Merck, and Philips, rely on Mendix to build web and mobile applications Thousands of our customers use our platform to delight their clients and empower their employees Its no surprise that were a recognized Leader by Gartner and Forrester in a redhot market expected to exceed 21 billion by 2022 Ok, maybe we did want to brag a little But were proud of what weve accomplishedandwere humble enough to admit that we need you to make us even more effective, , Our AppOps team is responsible for the managing of Mendix business applications These business applications are cloudnative CoTS Commercial OffTheSelf as well as applications build on our own Mendix Platform The AppOps team is closely aligned to the business and focused on managing these missioncritical applications, , As Application Administrator you have the bigger business picture in mind and be able to focus your talent in implementing new releases, data writing and manipulating, and a lot of configuration The atmosphere is highly collaborative with our business units, so we need a someone who will question what they are told and provide suggestions to better the business with the end goal of driving revenue and growth within the company, , , , , , , , While we live on different continents, speak different languages, and work on different things, we are bound by our MendixBlue guiding principles Being MendixBlue means that you live the culture, and you consistently improve it as we grow Its kind of a big deal, , We put the customer first  Without our customers, we have no business So, if you act in the best interest of our customers, alwaysyou belong here, , We think big  We work to have a meaningful, lasting impact on the world So, if you aim high and think long termyou belong here, , We innovate  We want to be what happens next So, if you ask what if and work to find a way or make oneyou belong here, , We nurture talent  We look, not just at the sum of what an individual has done, but at the potential of who they can be So, if youre up for learning from your failuresyou belong here, , We hear every voice  Inflated egos dont last here, humility does So, if you share credit and ensure that the best ideas win  regardless of who they come fromyou belong here, , We own it  If something needs doing, we do it So, if you focus on the outcome, and take initiative to get it doneyou belong here, , We have fun  We use laughter as a common language We can ask for help and were happy to give it So, if you find joy and purpose in what you doyou belong here, , , , There are precious few jobs that let you create the future But youll find one at Mendix We are at a pivotal time in our companys existence where rapid growth meets stable funding This is the time for industrious people to raise their hands to solve the next generation of problems Mendix is a place where ambitious people can thrive where you can identify an issue, propose a solution, and build the structure to make it happen, , Important to know Mendix is a Siemens business, which means were backed by the resources and stability of one of the worlds largest and most forwardlooking enterprises Think job security, , Since our company was founded in 2005, our aim has been to create a great work environment for people at all stages in their careers Thats why we are so pleased and honored that we were rated a top Cloud Computing Company to work for in 2019, based on feedback from our employees on Glassdoor With offices in the Netherlands, the UK, Germany, and the US, and more coming, we provide an international playground to truly impact the world through lowcode, , Digital Industries, , Mendix Technology BV, , Experienced Professional, , Fulltime

Introduction, Are you interested in learning the ins and outs of semiconductor process technology, enhancing customer satisfaction and influencing new product development, , Please note that our official recruitment process for this role will start as of January, In case you are interested in opportunities early 2021, then I encourage you to submit your application In case of possible match, you will be contacted by the recruiter, , , As an Application Engineer in the Customer Support CS Applications Engineering department your main goal will be to have satisfied customers You will achieve this through proactively providing customized applications solutions and creating tomorrows value with ASML products and services that enable our partners technology and manufacturing roadmaps These partners will not just be global ASML customers that use ASML machines, but will also be other ASML departments By using your accumulated knowledge, expertise and analytical skills, you will provide the consultancy services needed to fine tune the equipment and the process in order to obtain maximum performance, , , , During ASMLs new product introduction process, you will give input for the design as well as review documents to ensure customer requirements are met After new systems are fully installed you will visit customers to optimally fit them into the customers production process and finetune them for maximum performance As a highly skilled communicator, you will also be responsible for training the local organization so that our onsite engineers can provide ongoing customer support In particular, the forthcoming introduction of nextgeneration lithography equipment and options will pose a significant challenge and learning curve, , Together with input you obtain from ASMLs Development and Engineering DE department, you will take responsibility for determining solutions to customerrelated lithography needs, enabling them to achieve their goals This part of your job does not include standard hardwaresoftware support, but rather focuses on how to extract the best results from our machines, finding innovative alternatives where established practices dont work, , , , PhD or MSc in Mechanics, Physics, Mathematics, Electrical Engineering or a similar engineering degree, , , , , , , , , You will be based in ASML HQ in the Netherlands and from there you will support our colleagues worldwide ASMLs CS sector ensures that ASMLs customers are supported efficiently by providing knowledgetechnical services to onsite personnel in countries such as USA, South Korea and Taiwan and undertaking specialist engineering work at customer sites Within CS the Applications Engineering department supports the effective use of ASML machines in the customers production process, As an Application Engineer, you will report directly to one of the CS Applications Engineering department group leaders, , , , Please include the CV and customized cover letter for this role

Job Description: Auth0 is a unicorn that just closed a 120M Series F round of funding, with total capital raised to date of 330M and valuation of nearly 2B We are growing rapidly and looking for exceptional new team members to add to our exceptional talent pool  and who will help take us to the next level of success One team, one score, , Our vision is to provide people with secure access to any application in one click or less And our promise is to make identity work for everyonewhether youre a developer looking to innovate, or a security professional looking to mitigate We are looking for curious, excited, boundarypushing team members So, if youre a big thinker who is nimble and adaptable, Auth0 may be an ideal place for you to shine, , Auth0 gives companies simple, powerful and developer friendly building blocks so they can free up resources to focus on innovation We strive to be the identity platform of choice for developers and Enterprises We take our culture very seriously and are looking for people who are drawn to both our mission and our culture, , The Auth0 platform secures more than 100 million logins each day for customers all around the world  and were growing fast We are looking for software engineers with the motivation and experience to bring it all to the next level, , The Engineering Enablement Domain, focuses on solving hard foundational engineering problems, to enable Auth0 to move fast with confidence We create and offer a set of building blocks and abstractions on top of our Platform, that allow the product Engineers to develop faster We have several teams that go from building Cloud Agnostic libraries, shared rate limiting, and DB access services, frameworks and Libraries for Security Enablement to modern SRE and SDET work, , This specific position focuses on hiring for the Foundations team where we work to create abstractions to shared problems such as Logging, rate limiting, storing on different cloud providers, and managing shared components eg async garbage collector and services in the company We work with NodeJS  Javascript or Typescript, and a hint of Go, , , , , , , , , , , , , , Auth0 safeguards more than 45 billion login transactions each month and its top priorities are availability and security, , We like to think that we are helping make the internet safer Our team is spread across more than 35 countries and we are proud to continually be recognized as a great place to work Culture is critical to us, and we are transparent about our vision and principles , , Auth0 is an Equal Employment Job Description: Vacature van Sterrk, locatie Amsterdam, , Our client was founded in 2014 by three friends whom wanted to disrupt a market and make people feel good It is their mission to be the dominating premium brand when it comes to feeling good on a subscription base Since they founded the company, they have grown their company to 100 people in The Netherlands and have opened up shop in 6 different countries In the Amsterdam HQ, they have 20 different nationalities working in a very creative environment The feelgood products they deliver are all around the office and you see that its a young, vibrant atmosphere Lunch is daily made and super fresh Walking in here really gives you the feeling of a diverse workplace 50 women, 50 men and the average age is approximately 30, , This ITcompany delivers a physical product to the doorsteps of its subscribers The consumer can choose any style, delivery moment and frequency of delivery of their products Because freshness of the delivered product is key, our client has direct contact with over 350 producers of fresh products, Over the past 5 years they have built all their backoffice applications themselves The company is growing fast, however they have now made a plan to rebuild their back office systems to secure the scalability of the platform They plan to increase 10 times what they do now This means they are moving away from PHP and are building all new features in Python They spend about 30 of their time in cleaning up technical debt, , As a Senior Python Developer you will work in a team of 10 engineers You will work on features that can predict the amount of products needed over the coming months, but could also work on a delivery application or an internal tool to make marketing outings It is expected of you to be an engineer by heart You will work mainly in Python, but will have to deal with PHP and NodeJS as well Other technologies in the stack are Docker, CircleCI, MySQL, React, Redux and Google Cloud Of course, as a Senior Developer you will have architectural responsibilities Within the team you will find a challenging technical environment in a safe environment where making mistakes is supported As long as you learn They often do Pair Programming and you will be given the opportunity to learn from highly skilled colleagues, , , , , , 5cd8a0b9cc68f9ffa4c9253553278a55

Job Description: Vacature van Sterrk, locatie Hoofddorp, , Twee broers die samen een webwinkel runden, merkten dat er veel tijd verloren ging aan het verzenden van hun pakketjes Er werd naar een oplossing gezocht en in 2009 zijn ze begonnen met het ontwikkelen van hun eigen software waardoor het verzendproces sneller en goedkoper werd In 2010 is het platform live gegaan Momenteel werken er 95 man verdeeld over vijf verschillende afdelingen Innovatie is de kracht van het bedrijf, nieuwe ideen worden omarmd en krijgen echt de kans om doorgang te vinden Ook voor de komende jaren zijn de ambities groot en liggen er, onder andere in samenwerking met PostNL, nieuwe plannen klaar, , Tegenwoordig wordt het platform dagelijks door meer dan 34000 klanten gebruikt, worden er per jaar drie tot vijf miljoen pakketjes via deze software verzonden en is een jaarlijkse groei van 60 niet ongewoon Dit succes wordt alleen maar versterkt door het aangaan van een partnership met PostNL in mei 2016 Mede hierdoor zijn ze recentelijk verhuist naar een mooi bedrijvenpand dat de ruimte biedt om de komende jaren verder te groeien, , Het voltallige IT Team bestaat uit een IT Manager, 13 developers, twee testers, twee product owners en een informatieanalist De development afdeling bestaat vier teams Dit is het backend DevOps team, het API team, het Frontend team en een team dat zich bezig houdt met de plugins, , Naast het uitgebreide platform dat draait hebben ze ook een eigen website Deze is momenteel nog uitbesteed Op de website is er sinds april dit jaar een webshop ontwikkeld, waar producten kunnen worden gekocht omtrent verzendingen van pakketjes In deze korte periode is er nu al een omzet van meer dan 100000, euro gedraaid Het doel is om de website in eigen beheer te gaan nemen Daarom wordt er gezocht naar een Woocommerce Developer die het leuk vindt om ownership over de website te gaan nemen Er zijn anderen developers die ook verstand hebben van Wordpress en Woocommerce dus je doet het niet alleen Echter, het wordt jouw kindje Met de marketing afdeling zorg je er voor de website goed naar voren komt Omdat de website geen fulltime bezigheid zal zijn, draai je de overige uren mee in het Frontend team, , , , , , 5cd8a0b9cc68f9ffa4c9253553278a55

Job Title: Ontwikkelaar/Projectmanager Nieuwbouw DGK, 24 u p/w | Utrecht | BlueTrail
Job Description: Vacature van BlueTrail, locatie Utrecht, , Opslaan 0, Voor de afdeling Huisvesting wordt gezocht naar een ervaren vastgoedontwikkelaar projectmanager huisvesting die de initiatieffase voor de Nieuwbouw faculteit Diergeneeskunde realiseert Het betreft een project met een geschatte waarde van circa 85 miljoen, , Achtergrond, De organisatie heeft in september 2019 het Strategisch Vastgoedplan vastgesteld Hierin zijn de kaders en uitgangspunten voor de huisvestingsportefeuille van de organisatie vastgelegd Parallel hieraan is binnen de faculteit Diergeneeskunde gewerkt aan het opstellen van een Integraal Huisvestingsplan IHP, waarin op hoofdlijnen de impact van het Strategisch Vastgoedplan op de huisvesting van de faculteit Diergeneeskunde in kaart is gebracht Dit IHP vormt het vertrekpunt voor de initiatieffase van de nieuwbouw voor de faculteit, De nieuwbouwopgave omvat huisvesting voor de faculteit ca 27000 m2 BVO en voor het Gemeenschappelijk Dierenlaboratorium GDL dat in de toekomst transformeert naar het Centrum voor Biomedische Translatie CBT ca 6500 m2 BVO Om geen afhankelijkheden in het proces te creren zijn deze 2 onderdelen tot op heden separaat opgepakt In de initiatieffase zal onderzocht moeten worden wat de relatie tussen beiden is en of dit in n gebouw kan of hoe de twee tov elkaar functioneren Voor het GDLCBT wordt op dit moment nog gewerkt aan een variantenstudie business case wat na besluitvorming het vertrekpunt vormt voor de initiatieffase van de nieuwbouw, , , De opgave van de afdeling VC binnen de directie Vastgoed  Campus is om in de initiatieffase de kaders en randvoorwaarden voor de nieuwbouw van de faculteit Diergeneeskunde in kaart te brengen en besluitvorming hieromtrent te organiseren, zodat het opstellen van een programma van eisen in de volgende fase binnen duidelijke uitgangspunten kan plaatsvinden, In dit traject wordt duidelijk onderscheid gemaakt tussen vraag kant van de faculteit en aanbod Vastgoed  Campus In de initiatieffase moeten deze tegen elkaar afgewogen worden en dient besluitvorming plaats te vinden om tot een gedragen stuk te komen met kaders en randvoorwaarden tbv de definitiefase, Bij het uitwerken van de initiatieffase blijkt meer capaciteit nodig te zijn dan op dit moment voor handen is Daarom is besloten om een uitvraag te doen voor extra capaciteit en ondersteuning voor de portefeuillemanager, die verantwoordelijk is voor de totstandkoming van een ambitiedocument gebiedgebouwenergie en programmering, initiatieffase document en de kaderstellende investeringsnota voor het College van Bestuur, , , Opslaan 0, , , , , , , , , , , 5cd8a0b9cc68f9ffa4c9253553278a55
